item.title: Video Editor for Top 5 Horror YouTube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
Hi there! 👋 We're looking for a talented and experienced Video Editor for our Youtube Channel.

We need someone who can edit awesome videos in the Top 5 Horror niche.

Here are some channels similar to how we want the videos to be:

We are looking for a long-term collaboration. We'll start on a project basis, and if things go well, we would also have the retainer opportunity.

Please apply ONLY if you have experience.

I'm excited to work with you!

Regards,
Rick

item.title: Motion Graphic / Animation editor needed - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for someone to create motion graphics / animation videos for us.

We would like to post these videos on a consistent basis on our Instagram account. This means that we would like to post one of these every day to grow our account.

In the beginning we will give the ideas to you, but over time we do expect you to come up with animation videos yourself, without any examples or ideas from us.

If the collaboration goes well, this could become a long-term partnership.

We value this:
- Good / clear communication
- Creativity
- Motivated to possibly work together for a long time.

This is a good example of the kind of videos we mean:
https://www.instagram.com/reel/C2ruRCeo2-c/

Budget: $50
Posted On: June 29, 2024 18:03 UTC
Category: Motion Graphics
Skills:Motion Graphics, 2D Animation, Animation, Video Editing
Skills: Motion Graphics, 2D Animation, Animation, Video Editing
Country: Belgium

item.title: Social Media Assistant - Upwork
item.description:
Responsibilities:
- Content Creation: Develop, write, and schedule engaging content for all social media platforms (Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn, etc.).
- Newsletter Content:*Create, edit, and manage weekly newsletters to engage with our audience and promote our services and updates.
- Website Management: Update and maintain website content, ensuring it is current and reflects our brand's voice and vision.
- Graphic Design: Design eye-catching graphics for social media posts, website banners, newsletters, and other marketing materials.
- Video Editing:*Create and edit videos for social media, promotional purposes, and website use.
- Social Media Management:Monitor social media channels, engage with followers, respond to comments and messages, and grow our online community.
- Analytics: Track and report on social media metrics and website analytics to measure the effectiveness of campaigns and strategies.

Qualifications:
- Language: Native in Arabic and Pro in English
- Experience: Proven experience in social media management, content creation, graphic design, and video editing.
- Skills:
  - Strong writing and editing skills with a keen eye for detail.
  - Knowledge of social media platforms and tools

Budget: $500
Posted On: June 29, 2024 18:01 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Social Media Marketing Strategy, Finance & Accounting, Sales & Marketing, LinkedIn, Twitter/X, Social Media Management, Social Media Content Creation, Instagram, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Content
Skills: Social Media Marketing Strategy, Finance & Accounting, Sales & Marketing, LinkedIn, Twitter/X, Social Media Management, Social Media Content Creation, Instagram, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Content
Country: Kuwait

item.title: Need simple choreography for attached song in fun, rhythmic style - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking to create a "Just Dance" style dance along video and need suitable choreography that I can use and edit to turn it into the look and feel of the game. We need a youthful, tiktok inspired dance style while keeping the moves simple enough to learn quickly. The audience is a group of teens ages 14-19 so a look and energy that would appeal to them.

Im looking for someone that has fast delivery times.

The song is 4 mins but repetitive so you would redo the same moves for the choruses and repetitive lyrics.

For filming, green screen is best if you have it. The most important thing is crisp contrast with the background and no shadows, so we can remove the background easily.

Full body
No shadows (proper lighting)
Contrasting clothing/skin/hair or hat etc with the background so there is a crisp border and background can be cut out easily

We want the dance to be in a style like the Just Dance video game.

-Using "Literal" moves with the lyrics (so where it says shine a light - the move should incorporate something that visually depicts this) as you can see in the example links attached. But with more style as the audience are aged 14-19 and familiar with tiktok dance styles.

Also it will need to be mainly danced in place (some movement in each direction is fine but for the most part stationary since the teens will be learning and dancing this while standing together in a group.)
The moves should be clear and crisp so they are easy to follow.

Heres some clips from just dance. The moves really depend on what goes with the song.
We want fun, tiktok style, not provocative. Repetitive moves and not too hard to learn.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9Ab3cCIjddg
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HdpiKEy8hRM
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kwrFT0E_gO4

Something that gives the feel of the just dance game style but is also easy to pick up on and anticipate the next moves after watching only a few times.

Looking for youthful style of clothes. Dancer needs to wear an outfit that is contrasting with background and skin as we will add video effects afterwards.
Many of the dancers for just dance wear bright wigs, cool hiphop dance outfits, fingerless gloves etc.

Regarding the song- here are some examples of people that have done choreography to this song before. These are pretty boring so we are hoping yours will have more style but you get the idea:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fvWVs9hXxso
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9xrtcqkM47o
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SYs2NteyY0c

Is this something you can do? Id like to get this started right away.

Budget: $150
Posted On: June 29, 2024 17:45 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Choreography, Dancing
Skills: Choreography, Dancing
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: Creative Designer | Digital + Real World - Upwork
item.description:
In this role, you'll be the mastermind behind all things visual:
• Crafting eye-catching graphics and video content for ads, social media, presentations, and marketing materials.
• Developing a strong visual identity that aligns with our brand voice and message.
• Staying ahead of design trends and keeping our content fresh and engaging.
• Collaborating closely with our marketing team to ensure creative aligns with campaign goals.

We're looking for someone who:
• Has a strong portfolio showcasing graphic design and video editing skills (think Adobe Creative Suite).
• Keeps a pulse on the latest design trends and is eager to experiment.
• Thrives in a collaborative environment and enjoys brainstorming with a team.
• Can effectively communicate design ideas and revisions.
• Bonus points for experience with social media marketing and content creation!

item.title: Video Editor with a Feminine Touch for Short & Long Form Video Content for Social Media & YouTube - Upwork
item.description:
I am an Online Spanish Language Coach for Adults and am looking for a skilled video editor with a feminine touch to edit my short-form (and later long-form) video content.

Currently, my short-form content consists of only talking head videos with captions (see attached video). In the attached example, I talk straight through, but I see places where words or sections could have been cut out to be more concise.

My goal is to batch my recordings and then send them over to a video editor to save me time on editing so I can focus on content creation, writing captions, and sticking to a consistent posting schedule.

I don't want the videos to look overproduced—I just want simple editing as if I did it myself.

I'd really like to stop recording videos on the IG App, stop using filters, and record straight on my iPhone using Cinematic Mode.

That being said, I'll be interested in changing the font of my captions to something more branded, improving lighting, and smoothing out my complexion, lol! I'm looking to create videos that are "bright, white, and airy."

I'm not looking to use any B Roll in short-form content. Each video will be published on 3 platforms-- IG Reels, Pinterest, and, very soon, YouTube Shorts.

I am going to start a YouTube channel in the next couple of months, so I'm also looking for someone skilled in long-form video editing.  It would be great to have the same editor for both types of content for continuity.

Again, I don't want the long-form YouTube videos to look overproduced at first. A style that I like is https://www.youtube.com/@katie, although I will have less B-Roll to use at first. I don't know if her videos are considered "advanced editing" or not. I'm not interested in doing "vlog-style" content right now. Just more of me talking to the camera with cuts to B Roll.

Anyway, I'm simply looking to take the editing off my plate. I am listing this job at an hourly rate, but I am definitely looking for someone who is efficient with their time. It would be good to have an average estimate of time/cost to edit each type of video.

Thanks!

Dominique

Hourly Range: $25.00-$40.00
Posted On: June 29, 2024 17:28 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Social Media Video, Video Cleanup, Instagram Reels, YouTube Shorts, YouTube Video, Video Editing, YouTube
Skills: Social Media Video, Video Cleanup, Instagram Reels, YouTube Shorts, YouTube Video, Video Editing, YouTube
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Adult Daycare Video Animation 3D/2D - Upwork
item.description:
Video Content for Adult Daycare Center Social Media

We are seeking a skilled freelancer to create impactful social media videos for our adult daycare center. Our goal is to highlight our commitment to seniors’ well-being and to build trust within our community. Here are the key messages we want to convey:

1. Prioritizing Senior Care: Showcase that care, joy, harmony, and peace for seniors are our top priorities. We focus on providing genuine support rather than merely seeking financial gain.
2. Ethical and Legal Practices: Emphasize that our Medicaid reimbursements are taxpayers’ money, utilized legally and ethically. We ensure that all services provided are legitimate, avoiding any fraudulent practices.
3. Transparency and Communication: Illustrate our transparent operations, keeping families and seniors fully informed about our services. We strictly avoid unlawful commission practices, ensuring trust and compliance with the law.

By creating videos with these themes, we aim to raise awareness and foster a competitive, ethical environment in our community.


Hourly Range: $16.00-$35.00
Posted On: June 29, 2024 17:14 UTC
Category: 3D Animation
Skills:Animation, Motion Graphics, 2D Animation, Adobe After Effects, Character Design, 3D Animation, Graphic Design, Video Editing
Skills: Animation, Motion Graphics, 2D Animation, Adobe After Effects, Character Design, 3D Animation, Graphic Design, Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply
